advisories.title: Advisory Services
advisories.description: Connect with integrated government and private agricultural platforms.

kisanSuvidha.title: Kisan Suvidha
kisanSuvidha.description: A government platform providing information on weather, dealers, market prices, and plant protection.

mkisan.title: mKisan
mkisan.description: An SMS portal for farmers that provides advisories and information from various agricultural departments.

farmonaut.title: Farmonaut
farmonaut.description: A private platform using satellite imagery to provide farm-level advisories and monitoring.

agriapp.title: AgriApp
agriapp.description: A comprehensive app offering crop advisory, soil testing, and an marketplace for agri-products.

geofencing.title: Geofencing
geofencing.description: Define and manage virtual boundaries for your farm areas. Draw a polygon to analyze an area.

geofencing.soilDescription: Click on the map to get SoilGrids data for a specific point.
